issue.title: [Python] Improve Classes and Methods Docstrings for 8.0.0
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15367](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15367). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Initiative aimed at improving methods and classes docstrings, especiallly from the point of  view of ensuring they have an `Examples` section
